voicelines.title: Chat: Delays
voicelines.line: Come on. Enough procrastinating. Let's go.

voicelines.title: Chat: Relax
voicelines.line: I'm all for work-life balance, but I think this is pushing it.

voicelines.title: Good Morning
voicelines.line: Morning. Time to set the tone for the rest of the day, so if you're still feeling sleepy, shake it off!

voicelines.title: Good Afternoon
voicelines.line: I'm not in the habit of napping at noon, but don't let that stop you if you're feeling tired. I'll give you a wake-up call in, say, three minutes' time.

voicelines.title: Good Evening
voicelines.line: The lights are coming on now that the night is setting in. yawn Another delightful day draws to a close.

voicelines.title: Good Night
voicelines.line: Sleep well. ...Me? I still have a handful of things on my to-do list, but I'll call it a night once they're done.
